item.title: Game Changer (Hindi) Box Office Preview: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani starrer run time, screen count, advance booking & opening day - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer (Hindi) Box Office Preview

Published on: January 08, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, is set to release on January 10, 2025, and is expected to earn between Rs 2.25 crore and Rs 3.00 crore on its opening day.

  • The film is directed by Shankar and features a runtime of 2 hours and 44 minutes.
  • It aims for a wide release on over 2000 screens with a focus on mass belts and single screens.
  • Advance bookings indicate positive momentum with around 1000 tickets sold in major chains as of Wednesday afternoon.
  • The film's success heavily relies on word of mouth and audience turnout.
“A lot for Game Changer in Hindi will depend on the word of mouth, as a positive talk is a must for the film to recover the big investment.”

The anticipation for this film hinges on its content, with high hopes for its performance at the box office.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Manoj Bajpayee and Kay Kay Menon to spearhead Neeraj Pandey’s next; Filming begins in May - PINKVILLA
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Manoj Bajpayee and Kay Kay Menon to spearhead Neeraj Pandey’s next; Filming begins in May

Published on Jan 08, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Neeraj Pandey's next film is an edge-of-the-seat thriller that brings together renowned actors Manoj Bajpayee and Kay Kay Menon, highlighting the intriguing world of Indian Intelligence Agencies.

  • The film is directed by Neeraj Pandey, known for his work on popular spy thrillers.
  • It is in pre-production with filming set to begin in May 2025.
  • The project has garnered significant interest due to the successful previous works of the lead actors in the digital space.
  • It will be a feature film released on Netflix, slated for premiere in 2026.
“Neeraj Pandey’s next is an edge of the seat thriller set against the backdrop of Indian Intelligence Agencies. He has pulled off a casting coup by bringing two of the most talented actors of Indian Cinema on board.”

This collaboration is highly anticipated by fans of the genre, and updates on the film are expected as production progresses.

item.title: A R Rahman signs a Bollywood biggie, deets inside - 123telugu
item.description:
A R Rahman signs a Bollywood biggie, deets inside

Published on Jan 8, 2025

A. R. Rahman has signed on for a major Bollywood project, joining forces with Dhanush and director Anand L. Rai once again.

  • Rahman will compose the music for the upcoming film titled Tere Ishq Mein.
  • This marks the third collaboration between the trio of Rahman, Dhanush, and director Anand L. Rai.
  • The film is described as a romantic drama set in a small town.
  • It will also have a connection to the previous work Raanjhanaa, generating anticipation among fans.
"Tere Ishq Mein will have a connection to Dhanush and Anand L. Rai’s Raanjhanaa, adding intrigue for fans."

Fans are eagerly waiting for more details as this collaboration promises to be another enthralling film from well-known artists.

item.title: Priyanka Gandhi said ‘Okay, maybe’ when Kangana Ranaut asked her to watch Emergency - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Priyanka Gandhi's Response to Kangana Ranaut's 'Emergency'

Date: Jan 08, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Kangana Ranaut's solo directorial debut 'Emergency' is set to release, with the actress inviting Priyanka Gandhi to watch the film depicting Indira Gandhi's controversial era.

  • Kangana Ranaut plays Indira Gandhi in 'Emergency', a political thriller set for release on January 17, 2025.
  • Ranaut asked Priyanka Gandhi if she would watch the film, to which Priyanka replied, 'Okay, maybe.'
  • Kangana has previously criticized the Gandhi family, referring to them as “nepo kids” and expressing her disdain for nepotism.
  • The film features a cast including Anupam Kher and is co-produced by Zee Studios.
“The Congress has always been an appalling party for me. The nepotism in the party has been hugely problematic for me because I was a target of the same system in my industry.” - Kangana Ranaut

The film aims to spark conversations about a pivotal moment in Indian history, highlighting its relevance as it marks the 50th anniversary of the Emergency.

item.title: 'Vivian Dsena used to believe in Mahakaal, pooja, pandit..': Kamya Punjabi says actor was always ‘SPIRITUAL’ - India Forums
item.description:
Vivian Dsena used to believe in Mahakaal, pooja, pandit..: Kamya Punjabi says actor was always ‘SPIRITUAL’

Published: Wednesday, January 8, 2025 at 10:08 AM

In a recent media interaction, Kamya Punjabi discusses Vivian Dsena's spiritual beliefs before and after his conversion to Islam.

  • Kamya visited the Bigg Boss 18 house to interact with Vivian Dsena.
  • She expressed concerns that Vivian's behavior has changed during the show.
  • Kamya described Vivian as always having been a spiritual person with strong beliefs in rituals and Mahakaal.
  • She commented on his conversion to Islam, emphasizing that it's a personal choice.
''Wo hamesha se hi bahut pooja path, pandit, ye sari chizon mein bahut vishwas karte thhe, Mahakaal ko bahut maante thhe.''

The discussion highlights both Kamya's concerns and Vivian's longstanding spiritual beliefs, regardless of his change in faith.

item.title: 'Vivian Dsena used to believe in Mahakaal, pooja, pandit..': Kamya Punjabi on actor before converting to Islam - India Forums

Vivian Dsena used to believe in Mahakaal, pooja, pandit..: Kamya Punjabi says actor was always ‘SPIRITUAL’

item.title: Anupamaa's Spreha Chatterjee on her character Maahi turning negative: 'Rajan sir said hum decide karenge..' - India Forums
item.description:
Spreha Chatterjee Discusses Maahi's Negative Turn in Anupamaa

Published: Wednesday, January 8, 2025 at 9:15 AM | Source: India Forums

Spreha Chatterjee, who plays Maahi in Star Plus' Anupamaa, shares insights from her conversation with producer Rajan Shahi regarding her character's unexpected negative turn.

  • Spreha was not informed prior to her character's shift to a negative role.
  • She expressed that she is open to playing a negative character based on script demands.
  • Rajan Shahi reassured her that they would decide what suits her character best.

Rajan sir se jab meri meeting huyi thi he had had asked me if I had any problem playing a negative character, maine kaha, 'sir, no, I dont have a problem in playing a negative character, but I think sir mere upar suit kum karega because meri voice and all ekdum aise alag hai.' So he said, 'beta woh toh hum decide karenge na aap ke upar kya suit kar raha hai aur kya nahi.'

- Spreha Chatterjee

The show Anupamaa has faced declining TRPs recently, leading to significant changes in the storyline.

item.title: Anupamaa's Spreha Chatterjee was NOT informed about character turning negative: 'Rajan sir said hum decide..' - India Forums

item.title: Manoj Bajpayee confirms Vidhu Vinod Chopra bit his wife Shabana Raza’s hand: ‘Nobody can do this with me’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Manoj Bajpayee confirms Vidhu Vinod Chopra bit his wife Shabana Raza’s hand: ‘Nobody can do this with me’

Publication Date: October 2023Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Manoj Bajpayee discussed his wife's absence from acting and recounted a surprising incident involving filmmaker Vidhu Vinod Chopra.

  • Shabana, known as Neha Bajpai, stopped acting in films after 2009.
  • Manoj stated she didn't quit but ceased to get roles due to industry politics.
  • Vidh Vinod Chopra bit Shabana's hand to correct her acting during a scene due to her inexperience.
  • The incident was recalled by Bobby Deol in a past interview, emphasizing Chopra's intense direction style.
“Nobody can do this with me,” said Manoj Bajpayee about the biting incident.

This unusual memory highlights the pressures and challenges faced by newcomers in the film industry.

item.title: Kerala Businessman Detained After Actor Files Sexual Harassment Complaint - NDTV
item.description:
Kerala Businessman Detained After Actor Files Sexual Harassment Complaint

Date: Not provided | Source: PTI

Boby Chemmanur, a prominent businessman in Kerala, has been taken into custody by a Special Investigation Team (SIT) following sexual harassment allegations made by Malayalam actor Honey Rose.

  • Actor Honey Rose filed a police complaint against Chemmanur, accusing him of making repeated sexually colored remarks.
  • The complaint led to his detention after a case was registered under non-bailable sections.
  • Honey Rose expressed relief over the police action, stating that Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan assured her of a strong response.
  • Prior to this, she shared on social media about the harassment she faced without naming anyone.
  • Following the allegations, there were numerous arrests related to harassment comments online against her.
“Personally, I tend to ignore such awful remarks from mentally disturbed people with contempt and sympathy, but it does not mean that I am incapable of responding to them,” Honey Rose stated.

The situation has caused significant distress to her family, and the actor is hopeful for justice through the investigation.

item.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhira tortures herself post divorce; faints after beating herself - India Forums
item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhira's Emotional Turmoil Post-Divorce

Published: Wednesday, January 8, 2025 at 7:12 AM

The latest episodes of Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai focus on Abhira's profound grief following her divorce from Armaan, highlighting her emotional and mental struggles.

  • Armaan sends divorce papers to Abhira to protect his mother.
  • Abhira signs the papers with deep sorrow, leading to overwhelming emotional pain.
  • After receiving the papers, Abhira isolates herself, feeling regret and self-blame.
  • Due to extreme stress and depression, she faints, causing panic among her family members.
“I can’t believe I signed this. What have I done to us?” - Abhira

This sad turn of events underscores the show's dramatic appeal, drawing viewers into the complexities of love and sacrifice.

item.title: Game Changer’s EPIQ poster is truly epic | Latest Telugu cinema news | Movie reviews | OTT Updates, OTT - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer’s EPIQ Poster is Truly Epic

Published on Jan 8, 2025 12:00 pm IST

With just a couple of days until the film’s grand release worldwide, all eyes are on Ram Charan and Shankar’s pan-India political drama, Game Changer. This high-budget entertainer also features Bollywood actress Kiara Advani in a lead role.

  • The film will have an EPIQ release on January 10.
  • The poster features Ram Charan hanging from a helicopter, showcasing epic vibes.
  • “The power will echo all around you,” reads the poster caption.
  • Ram Charan plays dual roles of a father and son, including an IAS, IPS, and political leader.
  • The music is composed by Thaman and the film stars several notable actors in key roles.
“The power will echo all around you.”

Game Changer is set to be a major cinematic event, drawing significant attention ahead of its release.

item.title: Ekta Kapoor hits back at ‘unprofessional’ actors spreading ‘false information’ about her show, netizens say message is for Ram Kapoor - The Indian Express
item.description:
Ekta Kapoor hits back at ‘unprofessional’ actors spreading ‘false information’ about her show, netizens say message is for Ram Kapoor

Publication Date: [Date Not Provided] | Source: Indian Express

Producer-director Ekta Kapoor has taken a firm stand against what she describes as 'unprofessional actors' who are spreading false narratives about her shows. This is reminiscent of a recent controversy brought to light by actor Ram Kapoor, leading to speculation among fans on social media.

  • Ekta Kapoor criticizes actors for sharing false information about her productions.
  • Her message on social media has been interpreted as a direct remark towards Ram Kapoor.
  • Ram Kapoor recently spoke about his experience shooting a controversial scene in the show 'Bade Achhe Lagte Hain'.
  • Despite allegations, Kapoor's recent production received positive responses.
“Unprofessional actors giving interviews about my shows shud shut up! False information N skewed stories. Can only last till. I talk’…… but there is dignity in silence.” - Ekta Kapoor

This incident showcases the tensions in the television industry, especially concerning public narratives and personal relationships among actors.

item.title: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama to release on January 24; Baahubali, RRR writer oversees creative adaptation - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama to Release in 4K Remaster on January 24

Date: Jan 08, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The animated film, originally set to release on October 18, 2023, will now premiere in cinemas on January 24, featuring a 4K remaster and new dubs in Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu.

  • The film is directed by Yugo Sako, Ram Mohan, and Koichi Sasaki.
  • V Vijayendra Prasad, renowned for his work on Baahubali and RRR, oversees the new creative adaptations.
  • The film was screened at the 24th International Film Festival of India in 1993 but did not receive a theatrical release until now.
  • A new trailer will be released online on January 10.
“In response to the incredible enthusiasm from fans nationwide, we have decided to adjust the film's release date.” - Geek Pictures India

The update of Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama marks a notable revival of this classic film, catering to both new audiences and nostalgic fans.

item.title: Yash stuns with his swag in TOXIC birthday Peek - Greatandhra
item.description:
Yash Stuns with His Swag in TOXIC Birthday Peek

Publication Date: Wednesday

Source: Great Andhra

Yash celebrated his 39th birthday by treating fans to a surprise video from his upcoming film "Toxic - A Fairy Tale for Grown-Ups" on Instagram.

  • The 25-second video features Yash dressed in a retro white suit and fedora, making a bold entrance in a club.
  • Director Geetu Mohandas describes the film as unconventional, aiming to provoke thought and emotion.
  • The teaser presents Yash in a light that emphasizes his commanding presence and artistic vision.
  • Mohandas expresses admiration for Yash's creative process and the film's transformative narrative.
“When you let go of who you are, you become what you might be” - Rumi.

This film, co-produced by Venkat K. Narayana and Yash, promises a unique cinematic experience that transcends cultural boundaries.

item.title: Kerala businessman Boby Chemmanur taken into custody in sexual harassment case filed by woman actor - The Hindu
item.description:
Kerala Businessman Boby Chemmanur Arrested Following Sexual Harassment Allegations

Publication Date: January 08, 2025 | Source: The Hindu

The Kochi City police have taken businessman Boby Chemmanur into custody following a complaint by a woman actor alleging sexual harassment. This follows a swift investigation and is part of a broader inquiry into multiple complaints against him.

  • Chemmanur was taken into custody less than 24 hours after a complaint was made.
  • A special investigation team (SIT) is overseeing the case, having extracted him from another district.
  • He faces non-bailable charges under various sections of law, including sexual harassment and the transmission of obscene material.
  • The actor has provided digital evidence to support her claims and has previously lodged a complaint against multiple individuals for similar behavior.
  • The police have already arrested one individual linked to the initial complaints.
“His custody is the culmination of our action initiated from the moment we registered the case on Tuesday evening.” - C. Jayakumar, Assistant Commissioner

This case reflects ongoing concerns regarding online harassment and the treatment of women in the industry.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj needs THIS much to break even in Nizam - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Needs ₹20 Crore to Break Even in Nizam

Published on Jan 8, 2025 by 123telugu

Daaku Maharaaj is Balakrishna’s upcoming film, set to hit screens on January 12, 2025. Bobby directs this action drama, produced by Naga Vamsi.

  • To break even in the Nizam area, the film needs to earn a share of ₹20 crore.
  • The film's success heavily relies on positive word-of-mouth from its initial reviews.
  • It faces competition from Game Changer and Sankranthiki Vasthunnam, releasing around the same time.
  • Producers are confident in the film's success, which is why ticket prices in the Nizam region have not been raised.

Interestingly, this film's reception will determine its financial success, considering the stable ticket pricing.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office (34 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Might Miss The 1800 Crore Mark! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office (34 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Might Miss The 1800 Crore Mark!

Publication Date: N/A Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 has completed a month in theaters, showing signs of slowing down. Despite additional footage being added, the film is likely to fall short of the 1800 crore mark at the worldwide box office.

  • The film has broken several box office records both in India and overseas.
  • The Hindi-dubbed version significantly contributed to its success.
  • The current Indian net collection stands at 1240.66 crore.
  • Total worldwide gross collection has reached 1755.22 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 may not surpass Baahubali 2’s 1800 crore record but aims for higher numbers in future releases.

“The dream of beating Baahubali 2 might remain incomplete, at least during the first phase.”

As the film progresses, it could still achieve better milestones after its second theatrical phase.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut says she wouldn't have made Emergency if Anupam Kher refused to do it: 'There's honesty on his face' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut says she wouldn't have made Emergency if Anupam Kher refused to do it: 'There's honesty on his face'

Publication Date: Jan 08, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a recent interview, Kangana Ranaut expressed the significance of casting Anupam Kher in her upcoming film Emergency, stating that she would not have pursued the project if he had declined.

  • Kangana emphasizes Anupam's unique ability to portray Jayaprakash Narayan.
  • She describes Anupam's on-screen honesty as crucial for the role.
  • Anupam praises Kangana as an exemplary director who has dedicated immense effort into the film.
  • Emergency recounts the Emergency period in India from 1975 to 1977, exploring its political repercussions.
Anupam Kher remarked, "Kangana is one of the finest directors that I have worked with," highlighting her dual role as director and lead actress.

The film is set to release in theatres on January 17, marking a significant chapter in India's political cinematic narrative.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra - News18
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra

Date: January 08, 2025

Source: News18

The Bigg Boss 18 reality show, hosted by Salman Khan, is gearing up for its grand finale on January 19. Eisha Singh has shared her prediction of which contestant she expects to see in the finale, excluding notable contestants Avinash Mishra and Vivian Dsena.

  • The remaining contestants are Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, Avinash Mishra, Eisha Singh, Rajat Dalal, Shrutika Arjun, Chahat Pandey, Chum Darang, and Shilpa Shirodkar.
  • Eisha Singh revealed this during a competitive nomination task where she interacted with Karan Veer Mehra.
  • Controversies and tensions are rising among contestants as they vie for a spot in the finale.
Eisha Singh commented, “Tum (You)” when asked who she sees next to her in the finale.

Fans are eagerly awaiting to see who will ultimately win Bigg Boss 18 as the finale approaches.
